Attached lid containers are heavy duty plastic storage boxes with hinged lids.Some people call it plastic moving crates. They are storage and distribution boxes that are designed to stack when full and nest when empty, saving up to 75% valuable storage space.
Hinged lid plastic crates are commonly used for many types of applications, such as office moves, distribution, logistics, events and industrial storage. Large crates are commonly used in the removal industry.Our range of plastic crates are available in high density Polyethylene (HDPE) and Polypropylene (PP)

The stack nest swing bar boxes stack securely when loaded thanks to the swing bars / bail arms and nest when empty to save space. They are used across most major industries for storage and distribution

Attached Lid Containers are sometimes called Tote Boxes, Croc Boxes and Alligator Crates (because of their interlinking lids which resemble teeth). Hinged lid plastic crates are commonly used for many types of applications, such as office moves, distribution, logistics, events and industrial storage. Large crates are commonly used in the removal industry.

Features

  • Lid interlocks to stay closed
  • Eyelets on each end allow secure closure with zip ties
  • Containers can be stacked when lid is closed or nested when lid is open
